headline: Is Revvity (RVTY) Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness And DCF Valuation Gap
summary: If you are wondering whether Revvity’s current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. Revvity shares last closed at US$107.09, after a recent 7 day return of a 6.6% decline, a 30 day return of 9.1% and a 1 year return of a 13.2% decline. These shifts may have changed how investors see both its potential and its risks. These moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing coverage of Revvity’s role in...

headline: Revvity’s (NYSE:RVTY) Q4 CY2025 Sales Beat Estimates
summary: Life sciences company Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 5.8% year on year to $772.1 million. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $2.98 billion at the midpoint came in 1.3% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.70 per share was 7.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
